content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. The rental price for the 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim is negotiable. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest price possible. Can you give me an offer?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I am sorry, but I cannot provide you with an offer at this time. The rental price for this apartment is negotiable and I am waiting for your proposal.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euro per month.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,
Hassan Rahman.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Hassan. Your proposal of 800 Euro per month is quite reasonable and I am willing to accept it. I appreciate your interest in my apartment. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing from you in the near future.
name: Heinrich Heine
